actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to stabilize food prices at their February 1, 1973 level, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the President to issue such orders and regulations as he deems appropriate to stabilize food prices at levels prevailing on February 1, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to stabilize food prices at their February 1, 1973 level, and for other purposes.
